      Creates a new FileReader instance using the current subclass package hierarchy.
      AbstractApplication AbstractApplication.createFileWriter()
      Creates a new FileWriter using the subclass name as base file name, stored in the data directory.

      Creates a new FileWriter with a freely chosen file name, stored in the data directory.

      Creates a new FileWriter with a custom FileTarget and file name.

      Creates a new Scanner instance using the default System.in.

      Creates a new Scanner instance using the given input content.
      AbstractApplication AbstractApplication.print​(java.lang.String content)
      Prints content to the console output.

      AbstractApplication AbstractApplication.printfToFile​(java.lang.String format, java.lang.Object... args)
      Prints formatted text to the file output.

      Prints a linebreak to the console output.

      Prints a line to the console output appending a linebreak.
